channel.title: Private Servers
channel.description:
I've been like on this website 1-2 years ago. I used to play rsps's. But, how can people be still making, and why are people actually still playing those private servers? I mean, literrally Every private server is the same. 508/317, 24/7, Pk with bandos and dragon claws plsh plsh play and donate please.
Whats actually the point of making/playing them?

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=496627.msg3631324#msg3631324 date=1308249883]

Because its a different experience to real runescape

I agree with that one. Also not every server is the same, people can edit their server with some pretty cool stuff.

They can, but they don’t. Thats kinda the problem. They just leech servers to earn money immediately…

Not everyone leeches, but most people do. Find someone that’s known and play their server.

Mind throwing an example, cam’t find one.
[/quote]blake and graham dont leech. ^.^[/quote]
Do they have a server up?

Read full topic
